name: Population (Gapminder, HYDE & UN)
title: Population (Gapminder, HYDE & UN)
description: Our World in Data builds and maintains a long-run dataset on population by country, region, and for the world, based on three key sources: HYDE, Gapminder, and the UN World Population Prospects. You can find more information on these sources and how our time series is constructed on this page: What sources do we rely on for population estimates?
